title: 为什么我游戏开不了 求解 快点啊 我给50金粒
txt_content:
如题
他显示
Bad video card drivers!      
      -----------------------      
Minecraft was unable to start because it failed to find an accelerated OpenGL mode.
This can usually be fixed by updating the video card drivers.

--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 7fe0271 --------
Generated 14-1-22 下午6:16
-- System Details --
Details:

 Operating System: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
 Java Version: 1.7.0_51, Oracle Corporation

 Memory: 27289136 bytes (26 MB) / 65736704 bytes (62 MB) up to 1060372480 bytes (1011 MB)
 JVM Flags: 2 total; -Xincgc -Xmx1024M

 Suspicious classes: FML and Forge are installed
 IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0

 LWJGL: 2.4.2
 OpenGL: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null
 Is Modded: Definitely; Client brand changed to 'forge,fml'
 Type: Client (map_client.txt)
 Texture Pack: 我的世界龙之舞材质包.zip
 Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)

这是神马回事

replies.author: thb63825911
replies.txt_content: 是进入游戏后出现白色背景的字吗

replies.author: z719172589
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: y342900
replies.txt_content:
Bad video card drivers! Minecraft was unable to start because it failed to find an accelerated OpenGL mode.
This can usually be fixed by updating the video card drivers.意思好像是说你的显卡驱动要换了

replies.author: y342900
replies.txt_content: 它说通常靠升级显卡驱动即可解决，我觉得不则么靠谱，你还是删除些木用的mod，效果调低，抑或改用较低的材质包，速求最佳

replies.author: Jimu
replies.txt_content:
楼主可以试试我的方法，下载一个驱动精灵，然后更新，把缺少的东西都更新好了之后再进入试试看~

[diamond_gem]【古川口袋工作室-AncientCreekPocket】[diamond_gem]

replies.author: xiaowu123
replies.txt_content: mod出问题了 建议删掉几个

replies.author: kremlin
replies.txt_content: 右键——属性——设置——高级——疑难解答 把硬件加速的条拖到第2格或第3格再开游戏 。进游戏如果卡的话按F11全屏，如果没声音按F3+S。

replies.author: ml18
replies.txt_content: 楼主~~~~~~相信我~~~你显卡没驱动~~下个驱动人生~驱动一下就好了~~~~【新人，多多包涵】

replies.author: lan777
replies.txt_content: MOD冲突，那个中文的MOD是要删除的

replies.author: h968577431
replies.txt_content: 有两个解决方法：一是升级显卡驱动,二是右键桌面,选高级,再到疑难解答把硬盘加速拉到左边第三个。如果还不行，在minecraft启动器里把使用内存调到256或512MB一下。

Jimu 发表于 2014-1-22 22:20
楼主可以试试我的方法，下载一个驱动精灵，然后更新，把缺少的东西都更新好了之后再进入试试看~

谢谢 是显卡

replies.txt_content: 人品关系，每天水水更健康
